ARABIC: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for those who are kafir and deny Our Signs, they are the Companions of the Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But those who disbelieve and deny Our revelations are residents of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Those who disbelieved and gave the lie to Our signs are rightfully the inmates of the Blazing Flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those who disbelieved and denied Our revelations will be the dwellers of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those who disbelieved and denied Our signs, are the people of hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But those who disbelieved and belied Our Ayat, they shall be the dwellers of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And (as for) those who disbelieve and reject Our communications, these are the companions of the flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But those who disbelieve, and cry lies to Our signs -- they are the inhabitants of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But those who disbelieve and deny Our revelations, they are owners of hell-fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But those who deny the truth and deny Our signs will become the inmates of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And those who disbelieved and belied Our signs, they shall be the fellows of the Flaming Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But those who are faithless and deny Our signs—they shall be the inmates of hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But those who reject Faith and belie our Signs,- they shall be companions of Hell-fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But those who disbelieved and belied Our Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.), they shall be the dwellers of the (Hell) Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But those who disbelieve and belie Our verses shall be the companions of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But as for those who disbelieve and deny Our signs—these are the inmates of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But those who disbelieved and denied Our signs - they are the companions of Hellfire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [5:86]   But those who disbelieve and deny Our signs — they are the inhabitants of Hell-fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But those who disbelieve) in Allah (and deny Our revelations) Muhammad and the Qur'an, (they are owners of hellflre) they are the folk of hell.
